text: Hi Jonathon - sorry, I've had some pc issues and didn't have the slack app installed until now so I didn't see your message

So I guess the main thing I'm hoping to get is an insight on how to become more employable but also how to refine my work.

I'm sure I'll have more questions in time but yeah, I guess my main queries are about securing work and experience
